content.text: Hey, I'm just got back from yoga! It's been a pretty good day so far.
I'm glad to hear that! I've been working too many hours this week, I really need to take some time for myself.
I know what you mean, I've been there. What do you do for work?
I'm a social worker, I work with children who have been through a lot of trauma.
That sounds like a really tough job, but it's also really important. I'm sure you make a big difference in their lives.
Thanks, I appreciate that. It can be really tough sometimes, but it's also really rewarding.
I'm sure it is. I'm glad you're doing something that you're passionate about.
Me too! It's hard work, but it's worth it.
I know what you mean. I'm a yoga teacher, and it's definitely hard work, but it's so rewarding to see my students progress.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to try yoga, but I'm not very flexible.
You don't have to be flexible to do yoga! It's all about your breath and your mind.
I'll have to give it a try sometime.
You should! It's great for your mind and body.
